title: Leading airlines worldwide - based on total number of passengers 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Airlines in the x axis and Number of passengers in millions in the y axis.
The Number of passengers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Airlines American and lowest at Airlines Air China.
The Number of passengers in millions of Airlines American is 1.85% larger than the minimum value at Air China.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of passengers in millions for 10 number of Airliness.
Airlines American has the highest Number of passengers in millions and Air China has the lowest Number of passengers in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airlines in the x axis and Number of passengers in millions in the y axis.
The Number of passengers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Airlines American and lowest at Airlines Air China.
The Number of passengers in millions of Airlines American is 1.85% larger than the minimum value at Air China.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Airlines in the x axis and Number of passengers in millions in the y axis.
The Number of passengers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Airlines American and lowest at Airlines Air China.
The highest Airlines American has 93.7 more Number of passengers in millions than the lowest Airlines Air China.
Airlines American is higher than any other Airliness with value 203.7, followed by Delta, and Southwest. Down to Airlines Air China with the lowest value 110.0.
Considered together, the average Number of passengers in millions in all 10 Airliness is roughly 148.8.
Summing up the values of all Airliness, we get total 1488.0.
